statements: SELECT * FROM game_inventory ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE category='weapons';
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT item_name, category FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 100 AND quantity <= 5;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM game_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 1 AND category = 'weapons';
SELECT * FROM game_inventory WHERE item_id = 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, quantity FROM game_inventory WHERE player_id = 2 AND quantity > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM game_inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 1 AND 5 AND item_id IN (10, 20, 30);
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM game_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT player_id, item_id FROM inventory WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM items WHERE item_type = 'weapon'
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, item_type FROM items ORDER BY item_name
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory JOIN items ON inventory.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory JOIN items ON inventory.item_id = items.item_id WHERE item_type = 'weapon';
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory JOIN items ON inventory.item_id = items.item_id ORDER BY player_id DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory JOIN items ON inventory.item_id = items.item_id WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM items;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM items ORDER BY item_type DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_price FROM items WHERE item_price > 100 ORDER BY item_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level >= 5 ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_price > 50 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_experience FROM players WHERE player_level > 10 ORDER BY player_experience DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_price FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Weapon' ORDER BY item_price ASC, item_name;

SELECT player_name, player_level, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id GROUP BY players.player_id ORDER BY total_items DESC;

SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN player_inventory ON players.player_id = player_inventory.player_id JOIN items ON player_inventory.item_id = items.item_id WHERE item_type = 'Armor' ORDER BY player_name ASC, item_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM item WHERE item_type = 'weapon';
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM player JOIN inventory ON player.player_id = inventory.player_id;
SELECT player_name, item_name, custom_color FROM player JOIN customization ON player.player_id = customization.player_id ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_name DESC;

SELECT player_name, item_name FROM player INNER JOIN inventory ON player.player_id = inventory.player_id INNER JOIN item ON inventory.item_id = item.item_id WHERE player.player_level >= 3 AND inventory.quantity > 0;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM item WHERE item_type = 'weapon' ORDER BY item_name ASC;

SELECT player_name, item_name, custom_color FROM player LEFT JOIN customization ON player.player_id = customization.player_id INNER JOIN item ON customization.item_id = item.item_id WHERE customization.custom_color = 'red';
SELECT player_name, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM player LEFT JOIN inventory ON player.player_id = inventory.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_items > 2 ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, email FROM players WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_rarity = 'Legendary';
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players JOIN inventory ON players.player_id = inventory.player_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(item_id) AS total_items FROM categories JOIN items ON categories.category_id = items.category_id GROUP BY category_name ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM players;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_rarity = 'Rare';
SELECT player_name, email, item_name, item_description FROM players JOIN inventory ON players.player_id = inventory.player_id JOIN items ON inventory.item_id = items.item_id;
SELECT category_id, category_name FROM categories ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM players p JOIN inventory i ON p.player_id = i.player_id JOIN items it ON i.item_id = it.item_id WHERE quantity > 5;
